price: (Rasûlüm!) Sen, sana vahyolunana uy ve Allah hükmedinceye kadar sabret. O hâkimlerin en hayırlısıdır.
arabic: وَٱتَّبِعۡ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ وَٱصۡبِرۡ حَتَّىٰ يَحۡكُمَ ٱللَّهُۚ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-ittabiʿ mā yūḥā ilayka wa-iṣ'bir ḥattā yaḥkuma al-lahu wahuwa khayru al-ḥākimīna
